# penguin_tencentcloud_bandwidth_package (Data Source)

Select the schedulable shared bandwidth package with the highest available capacity in a region (via `GET /tencentcloud/bandwidth-packages`).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "penguin_tencentcloud_bandwidth_package" "selected" {
  region       = "ap-guangzhou"
  network_type = "BGP"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String)

### Optional

- `network_type` (String)

### Read-Only

- `available_count` (Number)
- `bandwidth_package_id` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
